statIntellect.name: Intellect
statIntellect.description:
Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

statDiscipline.name: Discipline
statDiscipline.description:
Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

Find and equip armor with Discipline to boost this effect.

statStrength.name: Strength
statStrength.description:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

items.itemDescription: At close quarters a fist is better than any gun.
"Dutiful Malok. Many offerings of Light did he make at the Shrines of Oryx." —Eris Morn
A shotgun, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.
"It is the blind eye that knows most keenly what it does not see." —Parables of the Allspring
For Ghosts whose Guardians have stood against SIVA.
General, my team did not intend for SIVA to have military applications. ~SIVA.MEM.WB014
Doctor Bray, I'm sure you've realized SIVA's applications extend beyond colonization. ~SIVA.MEM.CL011
"One day the Last City will be known as the First City."
Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015
"The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo
"If I am to die, let it be in battle, with weapons in my hands and laughter in my heart." —Lady Jolder
Destruction in motion.
The sound of beautiful destruction.
What were you thinking?
Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.
Float and spin.

items.itemDescription: There are flames that even the Darkness cannot extinguish.
~consume enhance replicate consume enhance replicate~ will drown your enemies—
Eirene ~If (SIVA) return replicate // else if (!SIVA) run ascension()~
"If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."
For Ghosts who scouted the Dreadnaught and lived to tell the tale.
This sounds like it could be invaluable to Exodus colonists. But Malahayati has some concerns. ~SIVA.MEM.CL009
"Have I the aspic in my lips?"
Well, SIVA requires no external power source, so…forever. ~SIVA.MEM.WB007
General, poorly worded or malicious code is the fault of the programmer, not SIVA itself. ~SIVA.MEM.WB010
Just give it a directive, and it won't stop until it gets a new directive. ~SIVA.MEM.WB008
"So long as we actually manage to do some good, you can call me Iron anything you want." —Lord Gheleon

Destruction in motion.

This item is nonreturnable.
The sound of beautiful destruction.
The heroes of the Iron Banner are never truly gone.
Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.
Kick it in your crypt.

items.itemDescription: Draw from the Void. Light the way.
~replicate~ devastate your foes ~consume~ Herja ~repeat
"I will keep your memories alive." —Lord Saladin
"To the first of the new Iron Lords." —Lord Saladin
For Ghosts who are forged in battle.
"Of what do Hunters dream? The places they've never been."
Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001
We've found a way to push our matter encryption technology even further. ~SIVA.MEM.WB002
Defy extinction.
Habitats, equipment, repairs of all kinds—all of these things can be made from one material. ~SIVA.MEM.WB003
"If I am to die, let it be in battle, with weapons in my hands and laughter in my heart." —Lady Jolder
The sound of beautiful destruction.
"We were not prepared to withstand the Whirlwind. No one is." —Variks

It's not just for Acolytes.
